invite.title: Invite Friends
invite.inviteTitle: Invite friends and earn extra rewards
invite.rule1Content: All registered and verified users can invite others. New users must complete registration to become invitees.
invite.rule2Content: Go to personal center to get your exclusive invite link
invite.rule3Content: For each successful invite, the inviter receives XX points
invite.tip1Content: Check your commission details in [My Profile] > [Commission Details]. Commissions can be used for purchases or withdrawal.
invite.tip2Title: 2. What causes commission to be invalid?
invite.tip2Content: Malicious commission earning through websites or other platforms will result in commission removal and account suspension once detected.
invite.tip3Title: 3. Can I invite myself for commission?
invite.tip3Content: No. We will manually review, and detected cheating will result in commission removal and account suspension.
invite.tip4Title: 4. How to know if invitation is successful
invite.tip4Content: Check your [My Profile] > [Invite Details] for status.

recharge.notice2: Minimum deposit amount is {{amount}} {{coin}}. Any deposit below the minimum will not be credited.
recharge.notice3: Please ensure your computer and browser are secure and your information is protected from tampering or leakage.

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.errorMinAmount: Withdrawal amount cannot be less than minimum

exchange.title: Flash Exchange
exchange.amountTooSmall: Amount cannot be lower than minimum exchange amount

faqList.q1: How long does it take for deposits to arrive?
faqList.q2: What to do if deposit fails or doesn't arrive?
faqList.q3: Can I use exchange wallets to deposit directly?
faqList.a3: Yes, but it is recommended to use personal wallets for deposits first. Some exchanges may have delays or processing failures. Using personal wallets can better protect asset security.
faqList.q4: Why hasn't my withdrawal request been credited immediately?
faqList.a4: Your withdrawal request needs to be reviewed by the backend. After approval, the system will initiate an on-chain transfer. The network confirmation time of different chains will also affect the arrival speed. Generally, USDT-TRC20 can arrive within a few minutes, while ETH/ERC20 networks may take longer. Please be patient.
faqList.q5: Why was my withdrawal request rejected?
faqList.q6: Can I cancel or modify my withdrawal request?
faqList.a6: Before backend review, you can contact customer service to cancel the withdrawal request; once approved and on-chain broadcast is completed, withdrawal transactions cannot be withdrawn. Please be sure to confirm that the withdrawal address and amount are correct.
faqList.q7: Why is the amount credited after I exchanged USDT less than what I entered?
faqList.a7: The system charges a certain percentage of exchange fees. Actual credited amount = exchange amount - handling fee. Please check the specific rate on the exchange page.
faqList.q8: Does the exchange operation require backend review?
faqList.a8: No. Exchange is automatically processed by the system. After submitting an exchange request, points or other currencies will be deducted in real time and corresponding USDT will be issued immediately.
faqList.q9: Why did my exchange order fail?
